attributes.action: introduce legislation to force property developers to fully compensate all those adversely affected by the development.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If a property development near you reduces the value of your home, you currently have no right to be compensated.  Allowing property developers to make huge profits at the expense of others is morally wrong.  This proposal seeks to give home owners, and others, a right to be fairly compensated when a development reduces the value of their property.
